actions.justification: Proper data collection is necessary for informed purchasing decisions
Standardized protocols will improve tracking and forecasting capabilities
Strong supplier relationships can improve lead times and pricing

strategic_plan.overall_strategy: Without specific data to analyze, the recommended strategy focuses on establishing foundational purchasing and inventory management systems. This includes implementing robust data collection methods, standardizing inventory protocols, and developing strong supplier relationships. Once these systems are in place and data is available, more specific product-based strategies can be developed to optimize inventory levels and ensure timely supply availability.
